response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. It has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards, offering unparalleled value and performance. We believe its worth is not just $1,000,000 but more, considering its unique features and potential impact on your business. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This is a significant discount compared to the market value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
